architecture.augmentations.equipment

Class Armor

  • java.lang.Object
    • architecture.augmentations.equipment.Equipment
      • architecture.augmentations.equipment.Armor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Item

    public class Armor
extends Equipment
    Represents armor worn by the Player. Each Armor has a material and type. From these (and level), the Armor's various normal AttributeBoosts are determined. Defense is similarly calculated.

        public java.lang.String[][] types()
        Description copied from class: Equipment
